NetSparkleUpdater.​Utilities
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Utilities

Provides commonly used utility functions to users of NetSparkleUpdater

Functions
GetVersionString
public static string GetVersionString(
Version version
)

Removes trailing 0 components from the given version.  "1.2.3.0" -> "1.2.3"; "1.2.0.0" -> "1.2"; "1.0.0.0" -> "1.0"

Parameter
version
Version

Version object

Returns

Version string

GetDSASignature
public static string GetDSASignature(
string fileToSignPath,
string privateKeyFilePath
)

Gets the signature of a file with the given DSA private key.

Parameters
fileToSignPath
string

Path to the file you want to sign

privateKeyFilePath
string

Path to the private key file

Returns

DSA signature as base64 string

GetAbsoluteURL
public static Uri GetAbsoluteURL(
string url,
string appcastURL
)

Creates a Uri from a URL string. If the URL is relative, converts it to an absolute URL based on the appcast URL.

Parameters
url
string

relative or absolute URL

appcastURL
string

URL to appcast

ConvertNumBytesToUserReadableString
public static string ConvertNumBytesToUserReadableString(
long numBytes
)

Convert a number of bytes to a user-readable string

Parameter
numBytes
long

Number of bytes to convert

Returns

A string that represents the number of bytes in KB, MB, or GB if numBytes > 1024.  If numBytes is less than 1024, returns numBytes.

GetFullBaseDirectory
public static string GetFullBaseDirectory()

Get the full base (running) directory for this application including a trailing slash.  From WalletWasabi: https://github.com/zkSNACKs/WalletWasabi/blob/8d42bce976605cca3326ea6c998b2294494900e6/WalletWasabi/Helpers/EnvironmentHelpers.cs

Returns

the full running directory path including trailing slash for this application

ConvertStreamToByteArray
public static byte[] ConvertStreamToByteArray(
Stream stream
)

Convert a given Stream to a byte array

Parameter
stream
Stream

the Stream to convert

Returns

a byte[] array of the data in the given stream

IsSignatureNeeded
public static bool IsSignatureNeeded(
SecurityMode securityMode,
bool doesKeyInfoExist,
bool isCheckingSoftwareDownload = false
)

Checks to see whether a signature is ncessary given the provided info on the SecurityMode and whether or not valid key information exists at the moment.

Parameters
securityMode
SecurityMode

the SecurityMode for the signature check

doesKeyInfoExist
bool

true if the application has appropriate key information in order to run signature checks; false otherwise

isCheckingSoftwareDownload
bool

True if the caller is checking on the signature of a software download; false if the caller is checking on the signature of something else (e.g. release notes, app cast)

Returns

true if an item's signature needs to be checked; false otherwise

NumBytesToUserReadableString
public static string NumBytesToUserReadableString(
long numBytes
)

Convert a number of bytes to a user-readable string

Parameter
numBytes
long

Number of bytes to convert

Returns

A string that represents the number of bytes in KB, MB, or GB if numBytes > 1024.  If numBytes is less than 1024, returns numBytes.

public static bool IsSignatureNeeded(
SecurityMode securityMode,
